    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Émission de radiation à partir de sources radioactives</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation emission from radioactive sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung Emission von den radioaktiven Quellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emissão da radiação das fontes radioativas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emissione di radiazione dalle sorgenti 
radioattive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπομπή ακτινοβολίας από τις ραδιενεργές πηγές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Emisión de la radiación de fuentes radiactivas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre trois types de radaitions émises à partir des sources radioactives A, B et C comme le montre par l'absorption mesurée de radiation de différents matériaux.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three types of radiation emitted from radioactive sources A, B and C as shown by the measured radiation absorption of different materials.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">air</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement d'alpha</string>
            <string language="en">alpha radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnements bêta</string>
            <string language="en">beta radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement gamma</string>
            <string language="en">gamma radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plomb</string>
            <string language="en">lead</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">métaux</string>
            <string language="en">Metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">papier</string>
            <string language="en">Paper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sources  radioactives</string>
            <string language="en">radioactive sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Typen Strahlung 
ausgestrahlt von radioaktiven Quellen A, B und C, wie durch die 
gemessene Strahlung Absorption der unterschiedlichen Materialien 
gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três tipos de 
radiação emissores das fontes radioativas A, B e C como mostrado 
pelo absorption medido da radiação de materiais diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre tipi di 
radiazioni emessi dalle sorgenti radioattive A, B e C come indicata 
dall'assorbimento misurato di radiazione dei materiali differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση τρεις τύπους ακτινοβολιών που 
εκπέμπονται εμφανίζει από τις ραδιενεργές πηγές Α, β και γ όπως 
εμφανίζεται από τη μετρημένη απορρόφηση ακτινοβολίας των 
διαφορετικών υλικών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres tipos de 
radiación emitidos de las fuentes radiactivas A, B y C según lo 
mostrado por la absorción medida de la radiación de diversos 
materiales.</string>
          </description>
